articles.title: Trump returns to scene of shooting - and a town trying to heal - BBC.com
articles.description: The mood in Butler, Pennsylvania, is a mixture of guilt and grief ahead of Trump's return.
articles.content:
Butler County in Western Pennsylvania is rock solid Trump country.
